TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManagementOperationObserver extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理非同步作業 (Asynchronous Operation)，並處理非同步接收的管理資訊及事件。

span.span: Manages asynchronous operations and handles management information and events received asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何執行非同步的執行個體列舉型別。The following example demonstrates how to perform an asynchronous instance enumeration. 此範例會使用以非同步方式處理管理資訊和事件的類別。The example uses the class to handle management information and events asynchronously. summary.span: 取消所有未處理的作業。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: 發生於作業已經完成時。

span.span: Occurs when an operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 事件資料Event Data 事件處理常式會接收類型的引數包含資料與此事件相關。The event handler receives an argument of type containing data related to this event. 下列屬性提供這個事件特有的資訊。The following properties provide information specific to this event. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| | (繼承自) (inherited from )|取得從觸發事件的作業回應的作業內容。Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.| ||取得作業的完成狀態。Gets the completion status of the operation.| ||取得或設定 WMI 物件中的其他狀態資訊。Gets or sets additional status information within a WMI object. 這可能是 null。This may be null.| ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何執行非同步的執行個體列舉型別。The following example demonstrates how to perform an asynchronous instance enumeration. 此範例會使用以非同步方式處理管理資訊和事件的類別。The example uses the class to handle management information and events asynchronously. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementOperationObserver_Completed#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementOperationObserver_Completed/cs/ManagementOperationObserver_Completed.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementOperationObserver_Completed#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementOperationObserver_Completed/vb/ManagementOperationObserver_Completed.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生於物件已經成功認可時。

span.span: Occurs when an object has been successfully committed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 事件資料Event Data 事件處理常式會接收類型的引數包含資料與此事件相關。The event handler receives an argument of type containing data related to this event. 下列屬性提供這個事件特有的資訊。The following properties provide information specific to this event. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| | (繼承自) (inherited from )|取得從觸發事件的作業回應的作業內容。Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.| ||取得已放置物件的識別 (Identity)。Gets the identity of the object that has been put.| ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

span.span: Occurs when a new object is available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 事件資料Event Data 事件處理常式會接收類型的引數包含資料與此事件相關。The event handler receives an argument of type containing data related to this event. 下列屬性提供這個事件特有的資訊。The following properties provide information specific to this event. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| | (繼承自) (inherited from )|取得從觸發事件的作業回應的作業內容。Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.| ||取得新傳回的物件。Gets the newly-returned object.| ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何執行非同步的執行個體列舉型別。The following example demonstrates how to perform an asynchronous instance enumeration. 此範例會使用以非同步方式處理管理資訊和事件的類別。The example uses the class to handle management information and events asynchronously. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementOperationObserver_ObjectReady#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementOperationObserver_ObjectReady/cs/ManagementOperationObserver_ObjectReady.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementOperationObserver_ObjectReady#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementOperationObserver_ObjectReady/vb/ManagementOperationObserver_ObjectReady.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生來指示持續作業的進度。

span.span: Occurs to indicate the progress of an ongoing operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 事件資料Event Data 事件處理常式會接收類型的引數包含資料與此事件相關。The event handler receives an argument of type containing data related to this event. 下列屬性提供這個事件特有的資訊。The following properties provide information specific to this event. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| | (繼承自) (inherited from )|取得從觸發事件的作業回應的作業內容。Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.| ||取得作業所完成的目前工作量。Gets the current amount of work done by the operation. 這個值永遠小於或等於 。This is always less than or equal to .| ||取得或設定與作業進度有關的選擇性額外資訊。Gets or sets optional additional information regarding the operation's progress.| ||取得作業所需完成的總工作量。Gets the total amount of work required to be done by the operation.| ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
